column4: Okay new updates: I actually installed ubuntu on my second hard drive, EXT2 filesystem. But Now when I load it up, I get VGA errors, X server won't start. I have an ATI x1800 Mobile video card. Any suggestions?
get a new video card.... :-\ as ati struggles in linux
That's very easy to say. Tell me where I can get MXM Type 3 mobile video cards
Ubuntu won't load at all, just the error message, then I CTRL+ALT+DEL to restart
boot up in recover mode, nano xorg.conf, and change it manually
Thanks, I will try that
yea, that's what i did
have you set up your default user yet?
Yeah, I set up a user
I tried "nano xorg.conf" but a blank window came up. I tried looking for the file but can't find it either :S
did you go to the correct directory?
xorg.conf is located in /etc/X11
I don't even know which
K i'll reboot and try again
Actually it was already set to "vesa"
well that's a bummer :-P
Generic Video Card, "vsea", "PCI:1:0:0"
check in private chat, it'll be easier to talk it out
I need to register my nick first
i don't think so...
& scottDkoDer, xchat is working, so is the gui
